def_cn: (人)虚情假意的，虚与委蛇的
def_en: If you describe someone as unctuous, you are critical of them because they seem to be full of praise, kindness, or interest, but are obviously insincere.

def_cn: （食品、饮料）含乳脂的，油的，油腻的
def_en: If you describe food or drink as unctuous, you mean that it is creamy or oily.
